trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define 3D geometric shapes.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref> class of objects can be used for hit-testing and rendering 3D graphic data.
A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D> by itself has no appearance.

To render a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D>, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D> to combine the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D> with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D> is the concrete instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D>.
To render a 3D shape, compose a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D> by specifying a MeshGeometry3D and a Material.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref>.
Bounding <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
